verses.roman:
suśīla, sahiṣṇu, śānta, vadānya, gambhīra
madhura-vacana, madhura-ceṣṭā, mahā-dhīra

synonyms: suśīla—well behaved; sahiṣṇu—tolerant; śānta—peaceful; vadānya—magnanimous; gambhīra—grave; madhura-vacana—sweet words; madhura-ceṣṭā—sweet endeavor; mahā-dhīra—completely sober.
translation: He was gentle, tolerant, peaceful, magnanimous, grave, sweet in his words and very sober in his endeavors.
